content: pop music hat yaya lovestoknit march 13 2023 sometimes it s fun to just sit down and cast on to knit without a pattern and no plan or set idea for me that usually means a basic beanie or cowl little shawlettes appear that way too but this hat came about using whatever stitch or stitch sequence popped into my head hubby was flipping between news shows and college basketball there was a lot of basketball the combinations of simple knit and purl stitches provide plenty of texture easy knitting for lots of interest song of the day pop muzik m https //youtu be/gpoiv0sz4s4 size adult the sample hat measures 8-½ from top to bottom and 19 around the bottom band unstretched yarn worsted weight the sample hat was knit using 60 grams/132 yards of stitch please superwash worsted in cabernet 100% superwash wool 100 grams/220 yards per ball needles us 06 circular needles plus us 06 double pointed needles other tools stitch marker tapestry/darning needle gauge 25 sts x 32 rnds = 4 square 1 | p a ge abbreviations used k= knit k2tog = knit two stitches together p = purl round = round s st s = stitch es begin pattern using the us 06 circular needle cast on 96 sts taking care to not twist the stitches place the stitch marker to indicate the beginning of round and join to begin knitting in the round knit 3 rounds of stockinette to form the rolled edge bottom band 1 purl 3 rnds 2 knit 2 rnds 3 repeat steps 1 and 2 once more 4 repeat step 1 body of hat 5 k4 p2 around repeat this step 5 times total 6 purl 1 round 7 knit 5 rnds 8 purl 1 round 9 knit 2 rnds 10 repeat steps 8 and 9 once
